title: Silvana Bio Vegan Food
typeOfFood: Vegan, Italian, Organic, Raw, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Bakery
description: An historical bar opened since the 1970s has been renewed in 2015 as a totally vegan restaurant by vegan chef Cristian Giorni. Menu consists of an eclectic creative mix of Tuscan traditions. All food is organic or biodynamic with the keyword being unconventional. Note that its opening hours vary so must check ahead before you go.
